thread.title: Fox’s Neil Cavuto: So Now Democrats Care About the Substance of Leaks?
thread.title_full: Fox’s Neil Cavuto: So Now Democrats Care About the Substance of Leaks?

author: Josh Feldman
title: Fox’s Neil Cavuto: So Now Democrats Care About the Substance of Leaks?
text:
Fox’s Neil Cavuto: So Now Democrats Care About the Substance of Leaks? by Josh Feldman | 5:27   
Fox’s Neil Cavuto ended his show today by remarking upon how Democrats are now concerned about the substance of leaks. 
He said during the campaign Democrats “and a very compliant media” downplayed the WikiLeaks revelations while playing up the issue of who and/or what was behind the leaks in the first place, saying, “You really can’t have it both ways.” 
Cavuto did also acknowledge hypocrisy on the other side too––after all, President Trump praised WikiLeaks on the campaign trail but this week slammed the leaks from his administration on Twitter . 
But Cavuto also noted how the press only tends to focus on calling out just one side. 
Watch above, via Fox News. 
[ image via screengrab ]
